metadata.name: Word on the Street
metadata.description: The Word on the Street Relic is a limited-edition collection of 1,024 NFTs created to commemorate the opening of Mask Museum. This NFT was skilfully designed by professional 3D artist Greg Gainor. The inaugural Relic represents a landmark event in the history of Mask DAO to fulfils its mission of sharing the word on the street about The Hashmasks and their collectors.
